definition: that clinches it/that's final/no two ways about it
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: The 1973 Yom Kippur War put the seal on the shift.
sentences.chinese: 1973年的贖罪日戰爭使這種變化板上釘釘。
